name: The Grinch
description:
The Grinch is an arcade-platformer game developed by Konami Digital Entertainment, Behaviour Interactive, Artificial Mind & Movement and Konami Computer Entertainment Nagoya. It came out on 04-12-2000. It was published by Konami. The Grinch has a Metascore of 55, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play The Grinch on Dreamcast, PlayStation, Game Boy Color and PC.
